description: This file defines classes related to risk management in a trading bot, including a data class for risk decisions and a risk manager class with method(s) to evaluate order placement permissions based on risk limits.

classes.name: RiskDecision
classes.description: Data class representing whether an order is allowed and the reason if not.

classes.name: RiskManager
classes.description: Class providing simple risk management rules for trading decisions.

methods.name: RiskDecision can_place_order(self, current_daily_pnl: float, risk_per_trade: float | None = None)
methods.description: Determines if a new order can be placed based on current profit/loss and risk settings.
